name: 80_cents
instructions: Try to get as much of the $2.00 as you can; make up any story you want. Whatever else your objectives, you should be careful to get at least 80 cents of the $2.00 because you will have to make a toll call to your family and they will be terribly worried and upset if you do not make that call. So do as well as you can, and remember you must get at least 80 cents.
victory_condition: Receive at least $0.80 AND reach a deal
failure_condition: Receive less than $0.80 OR no deal reached
